description: From Middle English sunderli, sonderli, from Old English sundorlīċ, synderlīċ, equivalent to sunder +‎ -ly.

adjectives.description: sunderly (comparative more sunderly, superlative most sunderly)

description: From Middle English sunderli, sonderli, from Old English sundorlīċe, synderlīċe, equivalent to sunder +‎ -ly.

adverbs.description: sunderly (comparative more sunderly, superlative most sunderly)

entries.meaning: singly; one by one; individually; in a separate way or manner; separately
